title: Exporting problems
content:
I generate my font (otf with kerning pairs). I use Extensis Suitcase 2 as my font management app, so I add my font to Suitcase and some (not all) kerning pairs looks terribly bad \_but\_ when I test it in Illustrator, the kerning looks good. Any ideas of what might be causing this?

Thanks!!!
author: mikej
